subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Yankees, three and a half games behind Toronto in the A.L. East, insisted their focus was on winning their division, but recent history shows that a wild-card spot is not so bad.
snippet: The Yankees, three and a half games behind Toronto in the A.L. East, insisted their focus was on winning their division, but recent history shows that a wild-card spot is not so bad.
